title: Emerald & Ruby Chandrika Haar: A Touch of Telugu Heritage
materials: Polki Diamonds. Features traditional Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.

The design incorporates a contemporary touch, making it versatile for various occasions.
colors: with vibrant Emerald Green and Ruby Red accents. The Polki Diamonds offer a subtle sparkle and complement the warm gold hue.

description: This Chandrika Haar seamlessly blends traditional Telugu design with contemporary aesthetics. Crafted with the finest materials and meticulous attention to detail, it is a testament to enduring craftsmanship and style. The use of natural emeralds, rubies, and polki diamonds ensures lasting value and brilliance. A piece that embodies both cultural heritage and modern elegance.
